page.title: 10THE WOODLANDS, RUSHBURY
page.content:
{Owners}-used to live at Church Farm, then at Woodlands,now moving to Church Stretton to retire. Looking forward to it, but would stay at Rushbury if their health was better.
{House}-built in 1954, lived in by present owners for 31 years. 17 rooms: 2toilets,1 bathroom, 1 coalroom, 4 bedrooms, 1 dining room, 1 lounge, 1 glass conservatory, 1 kitchen, 1 garage, 1 pantry.
{Auction} Thursday May 23rd 1985 at Sandford Hotel, Church Stretton. {Lot 1} Residential Smallholding, Detatched House,Farm Building, 32.558 acres. {LOT 2 }17.213 acres Pastureland
Both lots purchased by H.A.R.T. See page 6 of text.
